headline: Services for Data Center Markets, 2030 by Design & Engineering, FM, Commissioning & Testing, IT Infrastructure Management, Decommissioning & Relocation, Specialized Consulting and Certification
summary: The data center services market is set to expand significantly, with its valuation expected to soar from USD 115.94 billion in 2025 to USD 320.89 billion by 2030, exhibiting a CAGR of 22.6%. Growth is fueled by demand for digital infrastructure, cloud computing, AI, and high-performance workloads. The market spans colocation, managed hosting, cloud solutions, and more, prioritizing operational efficiency and sustainability. headline: 1 Mid-Cap Stock to Target This Week and 2 Facing Headwinds
summary: Mid-cap stocks have the best odds of scaling into $100 billion corporations thanks to their tested business models and large addressable markets. But the many opportunities in front of them attract significant competition, spanning from industry behemoths with seemingly infinite resources to small, nimble players with chips on their shoulders.
